titles.title: Hmong Veterans' Naturalization Act of 1994
A bill to expedite the naturalization of aliens who served with special guerrilla units in Laos.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1869-1870)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 2/24/1994--Introduced. Hmong Veterans' Naturalization Act of 1994 - Waives the English language naturalization requirement for certain aliens (or their spouses or widows) who served with special guerilla units in Laos. Provides for naturalization under the Immigration and Nationality Act through such service.
